Text: TV Dimensions, likely movie was filmed in that format.  Absolutely superb video, and audio is faultless as well--at least on my laptop with external speakers.  Well worth the download.
Hi, it wasn't working for me through the default of Divx PLayer, so I renamed the file extension .mp4 and it ran with media player classic.  I'm not very savvy, but this seemed to work!
Thanks for the great upload. Works perfectly!
(If you're having problems playing it, try VLC media player.)

Loved this as a child. Works perfectl!

Thanx.
